text: Glarus Süd is a municipality of the canton of Glarus in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Betschwanden, Braunwald, Elm, Engi, Haslen, Linthal, Luchsingen, Matt, Mitlödi, Rüti, Schwanden, Schwändi and Sool merged into the new municipality of Glarus Süd. Glarus Süd is one of three municipalities of the canton of Glarus, the others being Glarus and Glarus Nord. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Glarus Süd Category:2011 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities of Glarus
title: Glarus Süd
